price: Then We inspired Moses, “Strike the sea with your staff,” so it parted, and each part became like a huge mountain.
arabic: فَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱضۡرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَۖ فَٱنفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرۡقٖ كَٱلطَّوۡدِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
